title: Amend Foreign Reliefs
description: Allows the amendments of foreign reliefs

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: Relief on foreign tax paid to another country on overseas income.

amount.description: The amount of Foreign Tax Credit Relief (FTCR). The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

foreignIncomeTaxCreditRelief.description: Financial details about foreign income tax credit relief.

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must be ISO 3166-1 alpha-3

foreignTaxPaid.description: The amount of foreign Tax Paid on foreign income tax credit relief. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableAmount.description: The taxable amount paid on foreign income tax credit relief. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

employmentLumpSum.description: A boolean indicating whether employment lump sum for foreign tax credit relief has been claimed.

foreignTaxForFtcrNotClaimed.description: Object that holds the key value for foreign tax for FTCR not claimed

amount.description: The amount paid on foreign tax not claimed (FTRC). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
